function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate housing conditions for low-and middle-income people","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission","Mitigation":"Improving the residential environment and adapting it to new standards","Technologies":"Urban planning and affordable housing initiatives","People":"Low- and middle-income families, the elderly, immigrants","Owner":"Government, urban planners, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Socio-economic gap in housing levels","Impact":"Exacerbated impact on the poor, the elderly, and immigrants during epidemics and pandemics","Mitigation":"Reducing socio-economic gaps and improving living standards for low-and middle-income families","Technologies":"Affordable housing initiatives, social welfare programs","People":"Low- and middle-income families, the elderly, immigrants","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, social welfare organizations"},{"Description":"Poor distribution of housing units","Impact":"High-income housing surplus while low-and middle-income people live in inadequate conditions","Mitigation":"Revising housing distribution and addressing housing shortages in low-and middle-income areas","Technologies":"Socioeconomic planning and urban development","People":"Low- and middle-income families, the elderly, immigrants","Owner":"Government, urban planners"}]}
